Reviews.Title: A really solid kit, but don't expect a blazer.
Reviews.Author: RST "RST"
Reviews.Content: The full sized HTC One was one of my favorite new mobiles of the year. It was solid in the way that Apple hardware is solid and no one else is. But the screen was just a bit big for me and I couldn't reach all the way cross the screen. I traded in the larger one for this one. I lost some cash but got a phone that I really love the size.Everything about this phone is perfect except it's not the screamer that the full sized One is. Expect a bog down here or there on heavy processes-- that being said, it's a great phone once configured and updated and I'm happier with this than almost all other android options today.

Reviews.Title: Pretty and Powerful!!
Reviews.Author: sunnyoye
Reviews.Content: HTC One Mini (M4) is a great phone esp if you want a sleek and premium feel to your phone. I got this for my wife and she absolutely loves it. I have an HTC One M7, which is amazing as well but this phone is the best that I could find with a smaller screen (which was one of the most important criteria for my wife). Its easy to handle, less bulky, and still has all the goodness of HTC One M7.The seller (HeavyDuty Electronics) was awesome to ship the phone on priority when I contacted for a quick delivery. All in all, a great experience!

Reviews.Title: An incredible device
Reviews.Author: Aníbal Oyola
Reviews.Content: It is a great cell phone, amazing graphics and operativity, i used Iphone but totally i prefer the HTC one mini and the Android system

Reviews.Title: The "Mini" is a little larger than an iphone.
Reviews.Author: Skylark65
Reviews.Content: Great little phone.  This is my first Android.  I used Nokia Symbian for years.  I miss having different home screens for each slide over.

Reviews.Title: In Love with My New Phone
Reviews.Author: thepincushion
Reviews.Content: This phone is incredible. There is no way to describe it besides THE BEST. The only thing that I don't like about it is the battery. The battery is not very good for all day heavy use, but it will get you through the day as long as you don't use it ALL day and use the power saver option. It is smaller than the original HTC One, but not by much. I don't really see it as "mini." Many people complain about the camera, which is not a concern for me because it's actually very good and it has a lot of fun effects. If you want a GREAT camera, then buy an actual camera. It's great to quickly capture those important moments. A thing that I love on this phone is Google Now. Totally check it out, it's such a treat to have. The graphics on this phone absolutely blow me away and so do the speakers. All of my friends and family are really jealous of my Mini, even when they have awesome phones.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: William Colucci
Reviews.Content: Fit in hand better then anything else.  Just didn't work well with T-Mobile.  Otherwise, no complains on phone and screen was beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: Carmelle C.
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time safe and sound... it is as described... unlock and work with any type of carried I use mine overseas and I had no problem switching SIM card... at the start the language is in Chinese and you will just need to switch to your prefered language and start using your phone... great product,

Reviews.Title: HTC one mini ,best camera & sound
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Display is amazing for video playback. Looks are upmarket and the biggest plus is the camera & sound which is definitely better than nexus 5 .

Reviews.Title: Good Relatively Smaller Android Phone
Reviews.Author: V. Naik "straight_talk_guy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my iPhone 4S. I switched to Android after looking latest iOS7. This phone turned out to be good replacement. It has been three weeks so far.Pros:1. The phone can fit in your hand.2. The phone has "Beats" sound. The voice quality is much better than other phones.3. There is slow mode in camera.4. Android is not bad compare to iOS6 in terms user friendliness. One has to learn to customize.5. The power supply is standard mini USB.6. It is $100+ cheaper than iPhone 5S.Cons:1. The phone looks average. I could not find black color.2. Some area on glass is wasted for "Home","Previous" button.3. The phone is little bigger than iPhone 5.4. In very bright sunlight, it is hard to see screen.5. Customizing Android is initially little tricky.6. The camera is around 4 MP which HTC calls it UltraPixels versus latest iPhone has 8+ MP.7. Does not have memory slot as original HTC One does.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: ECKE
Reviews.Content: I love this phone ever since the first time I saw it. The sound quality is amazing, and the camera is also doing a good job. It has the beats audio so the music is awesome. it is light, easy to carry and can fit a person's hand better than the real htc one and the iphone. you can type a message very easily. the screen is also very responsive. it has nearly a month and I don't have any complaints, besides i do find it more useful every day.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: The phone came earlier than expected and took less than 4 days to arrive. It came with a 3 piece charger and earphones with an extra four ear-buds for spare. It didn't come with any phone company sticker like at&t; and is a fully unlocked version.

Reviews.Title: Good service
Reviews.Author: Julio Villarroel-VENCARGA
Reviews.Content: I love the phone really is one of the best options on the market so much so that I dare say it is the competence of the Iphone 5c

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: Sherri M
Reviews.Content: I got this for my brother for a Christmas present - haven't heard back yet, but no news is good news (^_^)

Reviews.Title: Big disappointment
Reviews.Author: Yuri C.
Reviews.Content: The phone supposed to be unlocked international version.Arrived with AT&T; logo. The package contained only USB cable, no charger and no headphones were supplied.It didn't work with my international sim. I spent hours looking for the answers on the net, however it did work only with AT&T; sim.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Claudia Villa
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone that I could use for social media, take pictures, watch videos, etc. This one has delivered, plus the HTC camera feature (Zoe) is really cool, menus are easy to find in my opinion so nothing is ever really hidden,  the phone is light and not too big, plus changing settings is not hard to do when I didn't like or get bored of something.

Reviews.Title: $300 for a broken phone??
Reviews.Author: Samantha Johnson
Reviews.Content: I got the phone and tried to turn it on, I made a start up tone and lit up then went black. After I tried to I figured it just needed to charge. An hour later and I have nothing. No indicator lights, no sounds, nothing to let me know its working. After spending over $300 dollars on this phone I am unhappy that it doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: average phone in high price......
Reviews.Author: Kamran Zia
Reviews.Content: its just an average phone not worth in this price if u planing to buy it. dont buy this n go for some other
